content: this bumblebee would *bee* a perfect companion while you re out and about he doesn t sting and would love nothing more than to explore the world very little yarn is needed less than 10g of each colour is what i used in the end to make my him the pattern is beginner-intermediate and has few intricate techniques included the stitches featured in the pattern are chain stitch single_crochet half-double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet invisible decrease increase slip_stitch magic_ring i don t include tutorials on how to make these stitches since there are so many resources on the internet being able to colour change is also a requirement what you ll need 2 00 mm crochet hook tapestry needle 3 different yarns in yellow brown and white which are compatible with the required crochet hook a pair of black 6 00 mm safety eyes or another substitute such as black beads or black yarn to embroider pink embroidery yarn alternatively a substitute like pink make-up could be used soft stuffing like polyester fibrefill
